## StandardSection() function

A component that displays all the results for a vertical using a standard section template.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function StandardSection(props: StandardSectionProps): JSX.Element | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  props | [StandardSectionProps](./answers-react-components-sendhelp.standardsectionprops.md) | [StandardSectionProps](./answers-react-components-sendhelp.standardsectionprops.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

JSX.Element \| null

A React element for a standard section, or null if there are no results to display
